net.jforum.dao

Interface BookmarkDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericBookmarkDAO

    public interface BookmarkDAO
    Author:
    Rafael Steil

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds a new bookmark.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Bookmark b)
        Adds a new bookmark.
        Parameters:
        b - The bookmark to add

      • update

        void update(Bookmark b)
        Updates a bookmark. Only the fields publicVisible, title and description are changed. All other fields remain with the same value.
        Parameters:
        b - The bookmark to update

      • remove

        void remove(int bookmarkId)
        Removes a bookmark.
        Parameters:
        bookmarkId - The bookmark's id to remove

      • selectByUser

        List selectByUser(int userId,
                int relationType)
        Gets all bookmarks of a given type.
        Parameters:
        userId - The bookmark's owner
        relationType - Any valid type declared in net.jforum.entities.BookmarkType
        Returns:
        A list with all results found. Each entry is a Bookmark instance.

      • selectByUser

        List selectByUser(int userId)
        Gets all bookmarks from some user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The bookmark's owner net.jforum.entities.BookmarkType
        Returns:
        A list with all results found. Each entry is a Bookmark instance.

      • selectById

        Bookmark selectById(int bookmarkId)
        Gets a bookmark.
        Parameters:
        bookmarkId - The bookmark id
        Returns:
        A Bookmark instance or null if no entry found

      • selectForUpdate

        Bookmark selectForUpdate(int relationId,
                       int relationType,
                       int userId)
        Gets a bookmark for edition.
        Parameters:
        relationId - The relation's id
        relationType - The relation type.
        userId - The bookmark's owner
        Returns:
        A bookmark instance of null if the record cannot be found
